inn1.comm: misdirected by Rainsford, he fails to control the movement and slides it wide of the pads down the legside and he clips it off his legs, fine leg runs square and he gets a hand to it on the dive but can't stop it completely
too wide outside the off stump, he decides not to play at it
struggles with his radar again, he slides it wide down the legside and doesn't play at it
rainsford struggles again, this is turning out to be a nightmare over, slides it wide down the legside again
sprays it wide of the offstump and Jayasuriya has to reach out to fetch the ball but he ends up chopping it towards the slips, that would have been a wide
much better, he's on target this time and he gets behind the line and defends
nearly had him there, it climbs up off a good length and comes back in, the batsman's squared up and the ball clips his shoulders and beats first slip
lands it outside off and he shoulders arms, he gets very good carry
walks down the pitch but checks his stroke and defends down the pitch
drifts wide of the offstump, he reaches out and mistimes the cut
hits a good length and gets very good carry to the keeper after the ball fizzes past the batsman
gets forward and taps it to the off side
tries to nudge it to the on side but he's caught on the pads, Mupariwa appeals
this one stops on him a bit in the region of the offstump and the ball hits him high in the pads as he tries to fend it away
strays on  the pads and he nudges it away towards fine leg, Jayasuriya slips at the crease as he turns for the second run
he gets this one to jag back in late and he nudges it to fine leg very close to his pads
gets on the backfoot and taps it away towards the covers
short and wide outside the offstump, he makes use if the width and slaps it between backward point and cover, not that well timed but good enough
gets across and defends back to the bowler on the backfoot
lands it on a length outside off and he shoulders arms
just strays on the pads and he clips it close to his pads to the on side
strays on the pads again and he swivels just a touch and clips it with ease past the wicketkeeper and down to fine leg
lands it on a length outside off and he thrusts his pad forward and shoulders arms
lands it on a good length outside off and he gets beside the line to defend
gets his pad across his stumps and closes the face of the bat as he defends to the on side
lands it just a shade outside off and he gets his pad across and shoulders arms
similar delivery, he gets across and offers no shot
fails to control the movement and sprays it really wide of the offstump, Taibu has to dive to collect it
much better, adjusts his line closer to the offstump and he defends back down the pitch
brillliant stuff, gets it to shape away late and Jayasuriya gets across his stumps to defend and he's completely squared up as the ball beats him
angles it on the pads, he shuffles and plays it away to fine leg
gets across his stumps and defends with a full face back to the bowler
gets across and defends it towards cover
it shapes away late and he defends to the off side with an angled bat
he overpitches outside the offstump and he moves across his stumps and punches it hard in the air past mid-off, he bisected the gap well
slashes outside off and the ball screeches towards the boundary at third man but Dabengwa does well to slide and cut it off
reaches out and flashes hard at a wide delivery
taps it front of mid-off and calls quickly
gets nicely behind the line and defends
gets forward to defend but the ball clips the outside edge and rolls wide of second slip
gets across and taps it down to point
loses his radar and sprays it wide down the leg side
once again swings it close to the pads and he nudges it to the on side
sprays it wide of the offstuump, Zimbabwe are struggling to control the moving ball here
pushes it back to the bowler who shows aggression flings the ball back to the keeper
gets the ball to jag back in on middle stump and the batsman is completely squared up as the ball clips his pad and heads to the keeper
reaches out ti drive but he gets an inside edge to the on side
vintage Jayasuriya! He overpitches on the offstump and Jayasuriya stays at the crease and scoops it over long-off

loose shot and Jayasuriya is very frustrated with himself, he chases a wide delivery swinging away and the ball clips the toe of his bat and travels to Masakadza at first slip who takes it over his head, terrible shot after hitting him for six
lands it on a length outside the offstump, he gets across and defends
gets across and taps it to the offside
Chance! he slashes at a delivety which seams sway and the outside edge flies past Masakadza who's standing deep at first slip
reaches out and cuts another delivery wide of the offstump and he beats short third man this time
gets his pad across his stumps and cuts wide of point, third man runs across and pulls it back just before the rope
shoulders arms very close to the offstump, very dangerous leave
lands it on a length outside off and he shoulders arms again, Taibu's up to the stumps
lets another one go to the keeper, Taibu fumbles the  take
full outside off and driven to the off side
angles it across the left hander and he shoulders arms
loses control of the movement and sprays it wide of the offstump
gets beside the line and steers it to point
gets his pad across and shoulders arms to a ball which straightens
sprays it just wide of the offstump
full outside off, he gets across his stumps and drives it square of the wicket to third man
gets across his stumps and works it to fine leg
gets across to a full ball and defends to the off side
shuffles at his crease and taps it away towards mid-off
gets it to skid through outside the offstump and he shouders srms
squares him up with another skidder and Taibu fumbles and takes it on the second attempt
angles it from outside leg and lands it on a full length on the offstump, he defends
short and wide outside off and he slashes hard outside off and places it to third man
adjusts his line closer to the offstump and he shoulders arms
gets to the pitch of the ball and drives it firmly through the line to mid-off
cramps him for a bit of room but he goes through with the cut and plays it very close to the body, third man pick it up
reaches out to drive but mistimes it
bowls it full and straight, he gets nicely behind the line and defends to mid-off
sprays it on the pads and he shuffles across his stumps just a touch and clips it between mid-on and midwicket, the fielder does brilliantly to pull it back before the rope
gets nicely behind the line and defends

the bowling change works! Absolutely plumb, it lands on a good length on middle and off and straightens, he shapes to whips it to the on side but the ball clips the flap of the back pad, very easy decision
another appeal for a lbw but this was drifting down the legside
sprays it wide of the offstump and Mahela isn't chasing that
angles it wide of the offstump and he gets his pad across and shoulders arms
angles it wide of the pads and he shuffles and opts out of the leg glance
he gets away with the wide this time, strays wide of the off stump and Doctrove is very lenient this time
Chance! He shapes to drive but the ball clips the outside edge and travels low to Masakadza's right at first slip and beats him
hits a good length outside off, he shoulders arms
the slower ball and this one keeps a little low as it fizzes past the outside edge
gets across his stumps and tucks it back to the bowler
loud appeal! he's trapped on the pads after the ball comes back in off the seam, Enamul Haque Moni reckoned it may have slipped down leg, good shout anyway
this one lands outside off and cuts away off the seam before reaching the keeper

Jayawardene's miserable run against Zimbabwe continues, the ball lands just a shade outside off and forces him to play at it, he gets a thick outside edge and Taibu dives low to his right and pouches it comfortably
nearly gives it all away as he gets on the front foot and flays hard at a delivery which shapes away
squares him up with a yorker and he gets his bat down and digs it out
pushes it to the off side
strays on the pads and he clips it to midwicket
crack! He overpitches just outside the offstump and he gets behind the line and slaps it hard past the bowler and mid-off
gets his front pad across and shoulders arms
reaches out to a wide delivery and chops it wide of first slip and down to third man
he gets a juicy half volley outside off, he gets on his knee and play a neat square drive wide of backward point
lands it outside off and he shoulders arms
strays on the pads, he shuffles and clips it away to fine leg
pitches it outside off and gets it to shape away, he doesn't offer a shot
adjusts to a fuller length and he thrusts his pad forward and shoulders arms

It's a double-strike for Rainsford, he gets it to come back in off the pitch and Kapugedera gets a half stride forward to defend, he stands outside his crease but the ball does enough to hit him in line with the stumps, Enamul Haque Moni raises the finger
just strays on the pads, it rolls away to the on side
gets across his stumps and works it to the off side
gets a juicy overpitched ball outside the offstump, he gets across his stumps and caresses it through the arc between mid-off and cover
gets a slight shuffle across his stumps and defends back down the pitch
gets across and taps it back to the bowler
shuffles across his stumps slightly and taps it softly back down the pitch
full on the pads and he tucks it back to the bowler
full again and he pushes it down the track
gets nicely behind the line and defends back to the bowler
he gets across to a delivery which angles across him, gets to the pitch and crashes an overpitched delivery wide of backward point, that scorches along the turf
gets on the backfoot to defend but he gets an inside edge to the on side
no turn, he gets a stride across and defends

lands it outside off and gets it to come in with the angle, he is a little lazy on the forward defense and hence fails to get his bat behind the line of the ball, he's hit in line with the offstump, another bowling change works and it's the captain himself
gets well forward and defends
flighted on the offstump, he gets forward and defends
flighted outside off, no turn and he defends again
floats it on middle and leg and he thrusts forward and defends again
flighted outside off, he lunges forward and defends
gets well forward and smothers the spin
stays back at the crease to ball that keeps very low, he manages to dig it out
gets forward and nudges it to the on side
flighted on middle and off, he gets forward and defends
comes round the wicket, he lunges forward and defends
bowls it very slowly and lands it on the middle stump,he charges down the track and lofts him just over the long-on rope
gets forward and defends
slower through the air, he gets forward and nudges it to the on side
gets forward to a full delivery and places it to sweeper cover
stays back at the crease and waits for the turn before punching it to long-on
comes round the wicket and bowls it quicker through the air, he thrusts forward and defends
fires it wide of the pads and he nearly gets a feather edge to the ball but it races away, beats the keeper
drifts it on middle and off and he turns it towards square leg
quicker through the air, he lunges forward to defend
gets beside the line and steers it towards point
commits to the front foot and taps it back to the bowler
tucks it just wide of the keeper ans sets off, Taibu gathers and aims at the stumps in one motion and Mubarak was in trouble
gets on the back foot and punches it with the turn to long-on
stays on the backfoot and punches to cover
quicker through the air, he lunges forward and defends
gets forward and tucks it against the turn to square leg
Utseya bowls the doosra and Mathews angles it to the off side
the conventional offbreak this time, he gets forward and defends
quicker through the air, he lunges forward and defends it away
lands on a full length outside off and he pushes it through the line to long-off
flighted outside off, he gets forward and defends
commits to the front foot and defends again
shuffles and clips it away down to square leg and calls quickly, they complete the single without fuss
tries to punch it to long-off but he can't beat the bowler
gets forward to a good length ball and defends
gets behind the line, waits for the turn and punches it back to the bowler
gets back and works it back to the bowler
waits for the turn and punches it to the off side
stays at the crease and tapt it to midwicket
punches it wide of midwicket for a single
gets a thick inside edge on to the pads as he defends
slower through the air, he lunges forward and steers it to the off side
pushes it quicker, he gets forward and smothers the spin
angles it from wide outside off and he defends
flights it on the offstump, he's content defending again
keeps him quiet for another ball as he settles for another forward defense
tries to push another full delivery down the ground but he can;t beat mid-off
defends to the on side
shuffles and clips the pad just outside the line of the legstump and he appeals
takes a couple of paces forward and works it to long-on
flighted on middle and off, he gets forward and defends
gets his pad across and works it towards midwicket
tucks it to the on side and Sibanda dives at square leg to cut it off
gets forward and works it to the on side
this one lands outside off and straightens, it missed the outside edge by a whisker
Mathews breaks the shackles by giving him the charge and lofting him against the turn, he clears mid-on comfortably
gets across and works it to the on side
gets forward very half-heartedly and another ball just beats the outside edge
gets across and works it towards midwicket
stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and punches it to long-on
gets a couple of paces forward to the pitch of the ball before working it against the turn to long-on
Mathews gains in confidence, he stands in front of the crease, gets on his knee on seeing the flight and drift and slogs it over deep midwicket
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
stays back and punches it down to long-off
rocks back and cuts wide of backward point
continues over the wicket, he gets forward and defends
tucks it with the turn to deep square leg
fires that quicker, he gets behind the line quickly and defends
cuts back on the pace and he nudges it to the on side
drifts towards the pads and he softly nudges it straight to short fine-leg
gives it a lot of air, he stays back at the crease and glides it towards short third man
rocks back and punches it to short extra cover
gets forward and defends
similar delivery, he pats it back to the bowler
quicker through the air, he pushes it down the track
shuffles on the backfoot and works it with the turn to long-on
the quicker one skids through, keeps low and Mubarak does well to keep it away
pushes it quick, he gets forward and tucks it to midwicket
commits to the front foot and defends
holds the length back, he shuffles and tucks it towards fine leg
stays at the crease, waits for the turn and punches it down the track
stays at the crease, it keeps low and defends
gets on his knee and fetches it from outside off, he finds the sweeper at deep square-leg
the field is up, he reaches forward to a pitched up delivery and punches it past the bowler on the up and beats mid-on comfortably
mid-on goes back and he;s in business straightaway as Mubarak pushes it in that direction
shot of the innings, it's pitched up in the slot, he stays at the crease and lofts it exquisitely through the line and the ball just clears the fence straight down the ground
the slower ball, he gets forward and beats the diving midwicket fielder
strays on the pads and he nudges it down to fine leg
goes for a loose drive and nearly feathers an edge to Taibu
shuffles and tucks it to the on side
strays down the legside
gets well forward and defends
flighted on the pads, he defends to the on side
slower through the air, he gets well forward and defends it away
gets down the pitch and checks his shot
gets forward, then shifts back and punches it to cover
quicker through the air, he gets forward and works it to the on side
this one keeps low and he just manages to defend
shuffles and knocks it to the on side
stays on the backfoot but he can't pierce the gap at cover
stays at the crease, he punches it to long-on
slower through the air, he pushes it to mid-on
this one stops on him a bit and he checks his shot to cover
punches a full delivery on the front foot to long-off
gives it a lot of air and Mathews works it to the on side
angles it on the pads and he tucks it away towards midwicket
lunges forward early and works it away with the turn to long-on
skids on to him and he adjusts well and cuts wide of point
gets forward and pushes it towards cover
punches it with the turn and Utseya sprints across the crease to try and cut it off
gets back and pushes it to the on side
works it wide of mid-on and sets off
drops it a fraction short and he rocks back and pulls but finds deep square-leg
defends forward but he gets an inside edge to short fine-leg
commits to the sweep early and he places it wide of square leg
pushes it fuller, he thrusts forward and defends
angles it towards the pads and he works it against the turn to square leg
takes a couple of paces down the track and pushes it with the turn to long-on
fires it full and he forces it back to the bowler
takes a couple of paces down but checks his stroke as Utseya intelligently drops it short
gets forward and pushes it to long-on
gets forward and pushes it to long-on
gets a bit of turn and the outside edge travels to point
rocks back, waits for the turn and cuts it to sweeper cover
works it firmly to midwicket

Mubarak takes his chances soon after taking the Powerplay, he gives him the charge and scoops it high over mid-on but fails to get the desired elevation to clear the boundary and Williams takes it easily and falls to his right after taking the catch
stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and punches it towards mid-on
quicker through the air, he defends forward
lunges forward and smothers the spin
gets his pad across and turns it towards square leg
tries to defend but he meets the ball with an angled bat
gets forward and pushes it through the gap between cover and short extra cover
pushes it slower, the ball doesn't turn and he taps it back to the bowler
flighted outside off, he pushes it to the off side
gets to the pitch of the ball and punches it towards long-off
pushes it quick and flat, he thrusts forward and defends
gets beside the line of the ball and steers it wide of cover and pushes the single
strays wide of the legstump
pushes it quicker and fuller, he defends and asks his partner to stay back
angles it towards the pads, he nudges it to the on side
gets well forward and defends
thrusts forward and smothers the spin
he dishes it wide of the offstump and he reaches out to drive but mistimes the shot, he should have crashed that
gets a bit of width again but he chops it down to point
bowls the slower ball and he shapes to biff it over the bowler's head but he misses it completely
Dropped He closes the face of the bat and slams it back to the bowler but Thushara reacts late and fumbles
pushes a single towards mid-off and the fielder dives and under arms the flick to the stumps and Thushara dives as well and makes his ground, the third umpire takes a look
comes round the wicket, he slides it on the pads and hits his front pad, stifled appeal from Taibu
chips down the track and clips it wide of short fine-leg
Thushara goes for the slog and he clears the rope, he fetches it from outside off and heaves it over cow corner
that's two in two, Dabengwa fires it on off and middle and leg and Thushara is more in control of the slog this time as he heaves it over deep midwicket
stays back, waits for the turn before punching it to the on side
gets forward and pushes a full delivery to long-on
holds the length back and he tries to mow it across the line, the ball misses the edge and the offstump
has to really reach out to fetch a full and wide delivery outside off and he places it to long-off
full on the offstump and he risks a quick single to mid-off, Utseya hits the stumps and Thushara gets home before another direct hit
works it to the on side and quickly sets off
full outside off and pushed towards long-off
tries to heave that across the line but he fails to pick the slower ball and ends up chopping it to short fine-leg
exposes his stumps and Chigumbura follows him and fires it on the pads, he clips it away to deep square-leg
makes room to smash it down the ground but the ball angles across him and he misses it
makes room and digs out a yorker length ball to sweeper cover
exposes his stumps again and he pushes  low full toss to long-on, he should have put that away
works it down the ground for a single
drops it short, he makes room and flat-bats it down to long-off, they're trying to break free but the boundaries aren't coming
drops the length short and he tries to heave it away but he mistimes the pull over midwicket
short in length again and this time he pulls it over square leg
takes a couple of paces down and tries to knock it over mid-on but he gets a thick leading edge to third man
scoops a slower delivery on the up and places it to mid-on after taking his hand off the handle, that's his fifty
swings, the ball rolls close to the stumps and Mathews sets off but is sent back, Taibu decides not to take aim at the stumps
drops it fractionally short and he heaves it behind square on the on side
fires it on the blockhole outside off and he drags it away to long-on
full outside off and he digs it out to the offside
full and swings back in, he tries to slog it away but the ball just misses the offstump
tries to mow it away again to the on side but gets a thick edge on to his body
makes room and carves it down to long-on
makes a bit of room and scoops a full ball down to long-off

inn2.comm: short and wide and he cuts to third man who's fielding quite square
strays wide of the offstump again, he bends his knee and cuts to square third man
drifts wide of the offstump again and he chops it down to backward point
lands it on a good length outside off, it comes back in just a fraction before reaching the keeper
strays down the legside and he clips it off the thighs and runs down to fine leg, the fielder is too square
hits a good length outside off and it holds its line before reaching the keeper
drives a full delivery firmly and Mubarak does well at short cover to slide and cuts it off
lands outside off and angles away from the right-hander sharply off the pitch before reaching the keeper
lunges forward to cover the angle and steers it wide of point
thrusts his pad forward and shoulders arms to a delivery to another delivery which angles across him
he rock back to punch it through the covers and nearly feathers an edge
lands it on a length outside off and he offers no shot this time
bends his knee and watchfully shoulders arms, the ball holds its line
slower in pace and he drifts towards the pads, he misses out an opportunity to work it fine and fetch a boundary
drifts the ball in to off and middle, he closes the face of the bat and mistimes it back to the bowler
lands it on a length outside off and he safely shoulders arms
full and swinging in, he gets to the pitch of the ball and drives through the line but finds mid-on
gets a juicy half volley outside off and he gets nicely behind it and finds the arc between backward point and cover
bangs it on a good length outside off and he gets behind the line and defends
thrusts forward and shapes to shoulder arms but he hangs his bat out and the ball clips the outside edge and safely rolls past second slip
adjusts to a fuller length and the ball goes through to the keeper without clipping anything
gets his backfoot across the stumps and pats it back to the bowler
full outside off and the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
drifts on the body but he tries to flick it away too quickly and the ball rolls off his pads to the on side
strays on the body and he clips it off his pads wide of square leg
again drifts on the body and he clips it down to fine leg
sids on to his pads and the ball rolls to the off side as he tries to work it away to the on side
sticks to the same line around the body and he tucks it away to square
drifts on the body and he tucks it away to fine leg

he adjusts his line to the offstump and gets an immediate reward, the ball cuts back in off a good length and goes through the gate between bat and pad and crashes on to the middle and offstumps, Sibanda goes for the off drive but fails to cover the line
left alone to the keeper
gets his pad across to a good length ball and defends to cover
he hits the deck hard and Masakadza  has a wild swish at it and misses it completely
gets beside the line of the ball and angles it down to cover point
gets across the line to a good length delivery which straightens and he pushes it back to the bowler
tries to force it past backward point on the front foot but he can't pierce the packed off side field
risky run but they make it, he shuffles and works it to mid-on and takes a chance with Murali's arm, his throw was just wide of the stumps
lands it on a good length outside off and he gets forward and pokes at it

funny old shot by Masakadza, he gets his front pad across the stumps, bends his knee and tries to slog him across the line but the ball cuts back in and hits him in line with the stumps, Doctrove raises the finger
gets beside the line and steers it to point
he gets forward and defends straight to short extra cover
hits a good length on the offstump, he gets forward and defends to short extra cover
fullish in length outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
short and wide and waiting to be hit, he stays at the crease, maintains hs balance and slaps through the arc between cover and mid-off
flashes at another one but he chops it down to third man
slides wide down the legside
delivers from very close to the stumps, he shoulders arms
Dropped, but a fabulous attempts by Jayawardene nevertheless, Taibu flashes at a wide delivery and the outside edge flies to Jayawardene's right at second slip, he gets a hand to it though
gets forward and pushes it down to mid-off
pushes it firmly down the pitch and he dives to his right and intercepts it
pushes it to the off side
full on the offstump and he drives back to the bowler
pushes another full delivery back down the pitch
pitches it up and looks for the chipped drive but Taibu thuds it on the turf to short extra cover
drives firmly and finds short extra cover again
thrusts his pad across the stumps and defends with soft hands
gets a bit of width and he stays back at the crease and steers it to third man
kicks up off a good length and cuts back in, he shapes to cut but he's cramped for room
lands it on a good length outside off and he shoulders arms
goes back and across and taps it in front of Mubarak at cover and sets off, it;s a direct hit but he's safe
pushes it towards mid-off
gets beside the line of the ball and steers it towards point
skids on ti him and he shapes to work it past midwicket but he closes the face of the bat and mistimes the shot
angles it towards the right hander he drives to the off side

timber! Kulasekara gets another one to cut back in sharply off the pitch, Taibu stays rooted to the crease, fails to cover the line, gets a thick inside edge and looks back to see his leg stump flattened
continues over the wicket, he lands it on a good length on the offstump and he defends
gets it to shape across the left hander and lets it go
bowls it back of a length outside off, he punches it hard and almost pierces the off side field but Mubarak effects a brilliant save at cover
gets behind the line and taps it to the off side
gets behind the line and defends to the off side
opens the face of the bat, hops at the crease and steers it to third man
the slower one, it keeps a little low before reaching the keeper
lands it on a good length outside off, he safely shoulders arms
strays on the pads and he shuffles and works it away down to fine leg
adjusts his line closer to the offstump, he gets behind the line and chops it back to the bowler
drives towards the covers and Mubarak again slides and saves a couple of runs, he's been very athletic today
lands it on a fullish length outside off and gets it to slant across, he shoulders arms
gets across his stumps to a good length ball and defends to the on side
hits a good length outside off, he shoulders arms
adjusts to a fuller length outside off, he lunges forward and angles it down to third man
wide outside off and slightly short, he rocks back and cuts to third man
gets behind the line to a full delivery and defends down the pitch
gives him a bit if width outside off and he opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
covers the line and defends back to the bowler
lands in line with the legsstump and strikes him high on the pad
shapes to drive him straight through the line but he gets a thick inside edge down to the on side
lands it on a good length outside off and he defends back to the bowler
gets beside the line, opens the face of the bat and steers it past the arc between second slip and gully
flays hard at a wide delivery outside off and fails to make any contact
strays on the pads, he shuffles and tucks it away down to fine leg
jayasuriya flings himself to his right and intercepts a booming off drive, that rocketed quickly off the bat
can't call that a chance, he bends his knee to scoop that over the off side and Kapugedera leaps up and gets a hand to it but the elevation on that shot was just enough to save Matsikenyeri
pushes it  to the on side
he's cramped for room as he shapes to cut and only manages a thick inside edge which trickles past the stumps and keeper
drops it on a fuller length and he pokes forward and misses
bangs it in short of a length and Williams takes evasive acrion and the ball deflects off his forearm and runs to fine leg, strangely Doctrove gives that as runs
classic delivery, he gets it to cut back in from a good length and slide Williams in half as he shapes to defend, the ball crashes on to the middle stump and pegs it back
gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
gets forward to cover the inward movement and tucks it wide of midwicket
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
thrusts forward to defend and he gets a thick inside edge onto his pads to the on side
gets across the stumps and shoulders arms
full in length outside off and holds its line before reaching the keeper
gets beside and the line and tries it angle it wide of backward point
opens the face of the bat a bit more and this time he dabs it wide of backward point
full outside off and driven just wide of cover
starts off poorly by sliding it down the leg side, wide called
hits him on the pad and there's a stifled appeal
terrible shot really, he commits to the front foot and tries to slog him across the line very early, the ball shoots through and hits the middle and leg stumps
reaches forward and drives through the covers
slower ball, lands it much shorter and he allows the ball to come on to him before defending
pitches outside off and the ball shoots through and misses everybody and rolls away for four
covers the line and defends
lands it on a good length outside off and he defends on the front foot to the off side
drives through the off side and Kapugedera dives but pushes the ball away to sweeper cover, Dabengwa turns around for the second run
stands outside the crease and gets a long way across his stumps before pushing it back to the bowler
gets behind the line and defends again
gets across his stumps to a good length ball and defends to short extra-cover
gets a nice stride across his stumps and whips it away down to mid-on
pokes his bat out to a delivery which straightens but he misses
slower through the air, comes back in and he defends
misdirects the legcutter wide of the stumps on the leg side
gets nicely behind the line and defends
drifts on the pads and he works it to the on side
drifts on the pads and he works it to the on side
gives him a bit of width and sprays it too full, Dabengwa square drives it and beats the arc between backward point and cover
exquisite drive, he thrusts forward to a full delivery and a simple defensive push is enough to beat backward point and cover, all timing

Jayawardene hangs on to it brilliantly, he pokes out and edges a delivery whuch seams away, Jayawardene stations himself at wide first slip and he flings himself to his right and pulls it off one-handed
another one seams away after pitching and he gets beside the line and defends
flashes hard at a wide delivery and misses
he's solid in defence as he gets forward to an incoming delivery and pushes it down the track
opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
strays wide down the legside and he misses a chance to glance it down
slower through the air, it comes in off the pitch and he defends late
gets well forward and defends it away again
angles it on the pads and he shuffles and tucks it away to fine leg
strays on the pads again and he clips it down to fine leg
slides on middle and leg, he defends back to the bowler

'It was that easy guys' -that's what Jayawardene appears to gesture to the fielders as he takes an easy catch at first slip, Murali delivers from over the wicket and Dabengwa tamely fishes at it and fails to cover the turn
comes round the wicket, fires it on the pads and he tucks it to the on side
angles it on the pads and he works it to midwicket
gives it a lot of air on the legstump, he gets forward and defends
gets forward and tucks it towards midwicket
commits to the front foot, opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man
gets well forward and defends
strays on the pads and he tucks it off his pads
gets a bit of width and he pushes it through the line and just beats the gap between mid-off and cover and Murali boots it away

and Mendis is the fastest to 50 wickets in ODIs! Price gives him the charge but is beaten all ends up to a delivery which is pitched a fraction short and straightens, Sangakkara effects one of the easiest stumpings
strays on the pads and he works it to the on side
thrusts forward but the ball beats the outside edge
thrusts forward and defends back to the bowler
comes round the wicket, he gets forward and defends
gives it a lot of air on middle and leg, he defends off his pads
gets forward and drives to short cover
gets forward and smothers the spin
comes through straight and he defends
flights it on middle and off and he defends
steers it to the off side
thrusts his pad forward early and defends very close to the pads
slides on the pads and the ball trickles to fine leg
defends to the on side
flights it on the pads and he works it to midwicket
flights it on middle and leg, he thrusts forward and defends

comes round the wicket and delivers the doosra, the turn beats the outside edge and he lunges forward but fails to drag his foot back in time, Sangakkara is sharp enough to whip off the bails in a flash
drifts in to the right-hander and he blocks it away off the meat of the bat
comes on straight, he defends it away

it's all over, Mupariwa gets on his knee early to slog him away but he fails to get the desired elevation and finds Tharanga at deep midwicket, easy take and Zimbabwe are bowled out for less than 100 for the 4th time against Sri Lanka
